mapper.select: select max(post_id) from post where user_id=#{user_id}
select max(rownum) from post where post_type=#{post_type}

select post_id, question_id, post_type, user_id, title, post_content, is_rewrite, write_date, report_cnt, is_adopted, is_anonymous from(select rownum as rnum, sub.* from(select * from post where post_type = #{post_type} order by post_id desc) sub where rownum <= #{idx}+#{cnt}) where rnum > #{idx}
select * from post where user_id=#{user_id} and post_type=#{post_type}
select count(*) from post where question_id=#{question_id}
mapper.insert: insert into post (post_id, question_id, post_type, user_id, title, post_content, is_rewrite, write_date, report_cnt, is_adopted, is_anonymous) values (post_id_seq.NEXTVAL, #{question_id}, #{post_type}, #{user_id}, #{title}, #{post_content}, #{is_rewrite}, sysdate, #{report_cnt}, #{is_adopted}, #{is_anonymous})
mapper.update: update post set title=#{title}, post_content=#{post_content}, is_rewrite='T' where post_id=#{post_id}
